remarks: The reciprocal of exponentiation with a mantissa greater than 1 has no lower bound.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2014.)
statement:
expnlbnd2 $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR /\ 1 < B ) -> E. j e. NN A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( 1 / ( B ^ k ) ) < A ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
